DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric identifier assigned to a location or field in which body tissue is exposed to high temperatures to damage and kill cancer cells or to make cancer cells more sensitive to the effects of radiation and certain anticancer drugs.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Postion or field for treatment in which body tissue is exposed to high temperatures to damage and kill cancer cells or to make cancer cells more sensitive to the effects of radiation and certain anticancer drugs.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (hye-per-THER-mee-a) A type of treatment in which body tissue is exposed to high temperatures to damage and kill cancer cells or to make cancer cells more sensitive to the effects of radiation and certain anticancer drugs.

Concepts.definition: A type of treatment in which body tissue is exposed to high temperatures to damage and kill cancer cells or to make cancer cells more sensitive to the effects of radiation and certain anticancer drugs.

Property.preferredDefinition: Position in relation to the surroundings.:A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

Concepts.definition: A position in relation to its surroundings.
A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric identifier assigned to a location or field in which body tissue is exposed to high temperatures to damage and kill cancer cells or to make cancer cells more sensitive to the effects of radiation and certain anticancer drugs.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: (hye-per-THER-mee-a) A type of treatment in which body tissue is exposed to high temperatures to damage and kill cancer cells or to make cancer cells more sensitive to the effects of radiation and certain anticancer drugs.:A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A type of treatment in which body tissue is exposed to high temperatures to damage and kill cancer cells or to make cancer cells more sensitive to the effects of radiation and certain anticancer drugs.
A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Duke University ThermoDox protocol adoption of C3D
